channel.title: logistic regression on ThreeFeetDeep

item.title: frosted glass
item.description: Please tell me when to cover my car Wouldn’t it be nice if there was a smartphone app that alerted me the evening before a potentially frosty morning, to prompt me to go and put the covers on the car windscreen, saving me checking the forecast each day? There wasn’t so I thought I would have a go myself. I had previously written a very basic Hello World!
